Sentence.sentence: The unpleasant voices have tended to dominate our perceptions," says Daniel Tichenor, a political science professor at the University of Oregon.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: By speaking in a deep, loud voice.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Their voices sound incredibly similar.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The twins' voices are quite different
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Rock stars now face a new hazard --- voice abuse.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: After last week's announcement that Phil Collins might give up touring because live concerts are ruining his voice, doctors are counseling stars about the dos and don'ts of voice care
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Paul, what advice would you give to singers facing voice problems?
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: If pop singers have got voice problems, they really need to be more selective about where they work
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: And is it true that some singers use drugs before concerts to boost their voices when they have voice problems?
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: But if they are taken regularly, they cause a thinning of the voice muscle
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Warm you voice up before a show and warm it down after.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: He has found a new way to train his voice
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Voice problems among pop singers.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: They also need to think about resting their voices after a show.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: And is it true that some singers use drugs before concerts to boost their voices when they have voice problems
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: "As advocates of children's rights, we believe that children should have a voice about what information is shared about them if possible," says Stacey Steinberg, a legal skills professor at the University of Florida Levin College of Law in Gainesville.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: "I can't imagine if there's any other acting job in the world where you don't know what show you're in, when you're hired," says voice actor Keythe Farley, who chairs the SAG-AFTRA negotiating committee.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: "It's a very small number of games that would trigger this secondary compensation issue," said voice actor Crispin Freeman, who's a member of the union's negotiating committee.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: "It's a very small number of games that would trigger this secondary compensation issue," said voice actor Crispin Freeman, who's a member of the union's negotiating committee. "This is an important aspect of what it means to be freelance (从事自由职业的) perfor
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: And it's refreshing to see a strong, curious, clever woman adding her voice to the scientific discourse and a field that has been traditionally dominated by man.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: But SAG-AFTRA says voice actors don't receive residuals (追加酬金) for their gaming work.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: So the voice actors are pushing for the idea of secondary compensation一a performance bonus every time a game sells 2 million copies or downloads, or reaches 2 million subscribers, with a cap at 8 million.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Steinberg pointed out that parental sharing on social media helps build communities, connect spread-out families, provide support and raise awareness around important social issues for which parents might be their children's only voice.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: To her, it meant moving confidently around the court room, using convincing body language, and projecting her voice so it could be heard from the judge's bench to the back door.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

means: Voice of Informed Community Expression 正式社团表达之声

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"声音"之意。
means: noise ： 通常指不悦耳的、令人烦恼的嘈杂声，隐含贬义。
sound ： 普通用词，含义笼统，指人们能听到的各种声音，无褒贬色彩。
voice ： 指人说话或唱歌时发出的声音。

stems_affixes.value_cn: 声音, 嗓音, 发音能力, 意见, 发言权
stems_affixes.word_buile: voice=voic出声,叫喊,看→n.声音, 嗓音, 发音能力, 意见, 发言权 v.说，表达
voice=voic出声,叫喊,看→n.声音, 嗓音, 发音能力, 意见, 发言权 v.说，表达

word_mean: 嗓音，语声，语音：由喉发生并经声道修正的声音
在喉部产生、口中说出的声音。这里的声音未必是语音。

Sentence.sentence: A company showed a new voice technology able to produce such a convincing human-sounding voice that it was able to speak to a receptionist.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: A study of British accents during 1970s found that a voice sounding like a BBC newsreader was viewed as the most attractive voice.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语广东卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: As usual, the voice of Peter Sallis is absolutely perfect for the role of Wallace, and Gromit is so beautifully brought to life, he can express a huge range of emotions without saying a word.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Before birth, babies can tell the difference between loud sounds and voices.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: But he is not content to simply record these voices before they disappear without record.
Sentence.come: 2014年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: But her cold voice really annoyed me.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷2 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Fancy hearing your voice! How are you?
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷2 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: His voice was almost gone and his heart was heavy.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Hoping that no one would notice that I was shaking inside, I threw my voice as far as it would reach: "Put your heads on the desks and close your eyes! We are going on a journey."
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖南卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: I voiced my biggest concern to my mother.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语北京卷 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: In addition, the team set up a separate experiment that suggested that the baby birds that most closely imitated their mom's voice were rewarded with the most food.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Into the complete silence of the waiting class came the teacher's sweet voice, "Good morning, children."
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 句子填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Kate heard a man's voice in the background, but she couldn't make out what he was saying.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语天津卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Mary was silent during the early part of the discussion but finally she gave voice to her opinion on the subject.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语天津卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Soon you will also question whether the voice you're hearing is actually real.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: That's because there are a number of powerful voice manipulation 处理 and automation technologies that are about to become widely available for anyone to use.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Therefore, it's a good idea to keep a notebook or voice recorder nearby when you're in the daydream zone.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 单项填空 选项

Sentence.sentence: They can even distinguish their mother's voice from that of a female stranger.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: They then heard a woman's voice coming from the wrecked vehicle.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Three days later, in the middle of the night, he heard joe's voice.
Sentence.come: 2014年高考英语全国卷2 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Unesco united nations educational, scientific and cultural organization recently set April 30 as a day to raise awareness of Jazz music, its significance, and its potential as a unifying voice across cultures.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Voice manipulation technologies may weaken that gradually.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: When he was writing his novels, Charles Dickens would act out the parts of the characters, he'd make faces in the mirror, and change his voice for each character.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（11月） 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Yet they feel they can know you just from the sound of your voice.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷2 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Your voice is actually super important.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Mental health has commonly been called conscience,instinct,wisdom,common sense,or the inner voice.

lj.lj_ly: the soprano is in marvellous voice.

lj.lj_ly: Our group rejected the proposal with one voice.

entry.def: When someone speaks or sings, you hear their voice .

example.tran: 米里亚姆的声音异乎寻常地平静。

example.ex: 'The police are here,' she said in a low voice...

entry.def: Someone's voice is their opinion on a particular topic and what they say about it.

example.ex: What does one do when a government simply refuses to listen to the voice of the opposition?...
example.tran: 当政府就是不肯听取反对意见时，你该怎么做呢？

example.ex: There was no disagreement, there were no dissenting voices.
example.tran: 既没有争执，也没有异议。

entry.def: If you have a voice in something, you have the right to express an opinion on it.
entry.tran: 表达意见的权利;发言权

example.ex: Egypt is once again accepted as an important voice in Arab politics...
example.tran: 埃及再一次被认为是阿拉伯政治中的一个重要声音。

example.ex: But your partners will have no voice in how you operate your company.
example.tran: 但是你的合伙人对你如何经营公司不会有发言权。

entry.def: If you voice something such as an opinion or an emotion, you say what you think or feel.

example.ex: Some scientists have voiced concern that the disease could be passed on to humans...
example.tran: 有些科学家表示了担忧，认为这种病可能传染给人类。

example.ex: The predominant opinion voiced by Detroit's Arab population seems to be one of frustration.
example.tran: 底特律的阿拉伯人所表达的似乎主要是一种挫折感。

entry.def: In grammar, if a verb is in the active voice, the person who performs the action is the subject of the verb. If a verb is in the passive voice, the thing or person affected by the action is the subject of the verb.
If someone finds their voice, they start to speak in spite of fear or surprise or difficult circumstances.
entry.tran: (克服恐惧、惊讶或困难）开口说话

example.ex: 'Kurt Kohn was my paternal grandfather's name,' Laura said when she found her voice.
example.tran: “库尔特·科恩是我祖父的名字，”克服了恐惧的劳拉开口说道。

entry.def: If you say that a writer finds his or her voice, you mean that he or she finds a style and subject matter that are personal and original.
entry.tran: （作家）形成个人风格，找到属于自己的写作主题

example.ex: The poems which he wrote in the trenches are generally agreed to be those in which he found his true voice.
example.tran: 他在战壕里创作的那些诗歌被公认为是他找到了自己声音的作品。

entry.def: If you give voice to an opinion, a need, or a desire, you express it aloud.
entry.tran: 表达（观点）；表露（需求）；表白（心迹）

example.ex: ...a community radio run by the Catholic Church which gave voice to the protests of the slum-dwellers.
example.tran: 一家由天主教教会开办的、贫民区居民可以在其节目中表达抗议的社区电台

entry.def: If someone tells you to keep your voice down, they are asking you to speak more quietly.

example.ex: Keep your voice down, for goodness sake.
example.tran: 看在上天的份儿上，小点儿声。

entry.def: If you lose your voice, you cannot speak for a while because of an illness.

example.ex: I had to be careful not to get a sore throat and lose my voice.
example.tran: 我必须得小心，免得嗓子痛，话都说不出来。

entry.def: If you raise your voice, you speak more loudly. If you lower your voice, you speak more quietly.

example.ex: He raised his voice for the benefit of the other two women...
example.tran: 为了让其他两个女人听清，他提高了嗓门。

example.ex: She'd lowered her voice until it was barely audible.
example.tran: 她把嗓音压低到几乎听不见。

entry.def: If you say something at the top of your voice, you say it as loudly as possible.
entry.tran: 以最大的声音;声嘶力竭地

example.ex: 'Damn!' he yelled at the top of his voice.

entry.def: If a number of people say something with one voice, they all express the same opinion about something.
entry.tran: 异口同声地;众口一词地

example.ex: This would enable the community to speak with one voice in world affairs.
example.tran: 这将使该共同体在国际事务上能以一个声音讲话。

means.word_mean: 1. the distinctive quality or pitch or condition of a person's speech;
2. the sound made by the vibration of vocal folds modified by the resonance of the vocal tract;

sentences.sentence: "a singer takes good care of his voice"

means.word_mean: 3. a sound suggestive of a vocal utterance;
4. expressing in coherent verbal form;
5. a means or agency by which something is expressed or communicated;

sentences.sentence: "the Times is not the voice of New York"

means.word_mean: 6. something suggestive of speech in being a medium of expression;

sentences.sentence: "he said his voices told him to do it"

means.word_mean: 7. (metonymy) a singer;

sentences.sentence: "he wanted to hear trained voices sing it"

means.word_mean: 8. an advocate who represents someone else's policy or purpose;

sentences.sentence: "the meeting was attended by spokespersons for all the major organs of government"

means.word_mean: 9. the ability to speak;
10. (linguistics) the grammatical relation (active or passive) of the grammatical subject of a verb to the action that the verb denotes
11. the melody carried by a particular voice or instrument in polyphonic music;

sentences.sentence: "he tried to sing the tenor part"

means.word_mean: 1. give voice to;
2. utter with vibrating vocal chords

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French vois, from Latin vox, voc-

means: Voice of Informed Community Expression 正式社团表达之声

sentences.cn: 我能听到隔壁说话的声音。
sentences.en: I could hear voices in the next room.

sentences.cn: 低沉地说、轻柔地说、大声地说、轻声地说等
sentences.en: to speak in a deep/soft/loud/quiet, etc. voice

sentences.cn: “我答应。”她小声说。
sentences.en: ‘I promise, ’ she said in a small voice (= a quiet, shy voice) .

sentences.cn: 提高 / 压低嗓门
sentences.en: to raise/lower your voice (= to speak louder/more quietly)

sentences.cn: 说话轻一些。

sentences.cn: 他有着嘶哑的嗓音.
sentences.en: He has a husky voice.

sentences.cn: 他那沙哑的嗓音让人一听就知道是他.
sentences.en: His hoarse voice was quickly identified.

sentences.cn: 入射的太阳能被较厚的水层吸收分散.
sentences.en: The incoming solar energy is shared by a thicker layer of water.

sentences.cn: 他的浑厚嗓音响彻大厅.
sentences.en: His voice boomed out, reaching the back of the hall.

sentences.cn: 他低沉有力的嗓音响彻大厅.
sentences.en: His deep voice boomed through the hall.

sentences.cn: 她总是装腔作势,用一种优雅的嗓音跟教区牧师讲话.
sentences.en: She always puts on a posh voice to talk to the vicar.

sentences.cn: 他那刺耳的嗓音响彻整个房子.
sentences.en: His strident voice rang through the house.

sentences.cn: 她的嗓音听起来很悦耳.
sentences.en: She has an agreeable voice.

sentences.cn: 他的嗓音变粗了(变低沉,像成年人的了).
sentences.en: His voice has broken, ie become deep like a man's.

sentences.cn: 对一个十几岁的男孩来说,他的嗓音很尖.
sentences.en: His voice is very high for a teenage boy.

sentences.cn: 接着她开始唱歌, 她那出人意料的成熟嗓音令在场的每一个人为之着迷.
sentences.en: And then she begins to sing. Her unexpectedly mature voice captivated everyone in the room.

sentences.cn: 他拥有歌剧男高音的嗓音,却如摇滚明星般广受欢迎.
sentences.en: He has the voice of an operatic 1 tenor and the status of a rock star.

sentences.cn: “你认为我是个老古板,老保守党, ”他那若有所思的嗓音说.
sentences.en: You think me an old fogey and an old tory, his thoughtful voice said.

sentences.cn: 她有自然 、 清亮的女高音嗓音.
sentences.en: She has a natural, clear soprano voice.

sentences.cn: 一听到你的歌声,我就迷倒在你的嗓音中. 在脑海中想象你是怎样一个人, 那嗓音只应天上有.
sentences.en: Listening your songs falling in your voice. imaging your appearance, that's too bueatiful to believe.

sentences.cn: 她用柔和悦耳的嗓音说一口带德国腔的英国口音.
sentences.en: She spoke in a mild sweet voice with a British accent, faintly Germanic in intonation.

sentences.cn: 她嗓音非常低沉.
sentences.en: She has a very deep voice.

sentences.cn: 玫的嗓音激昂如长笛,由她和妈妈引领这个小小的合唱团.
sentences.en: Meg had a voice like a flute and she and her mother led the little choir.

sentences.cn: 听筒中传来她美妙的嗓音.
sentences.en: From receiver came out her beautiful voice.

sentences.cn: 她的嗓音下降了八度.
sentences.en: Her voice went down an octave.

sentences.cn: 她唱歌的嗓音很自然.
sentences.en: She sings with a natural voice.

sentences.cn: 用现在完成时的被动语态改写下列句子.
sentences.en: Rewrite the following sentences using the Present Perfect Passive Voice.

sentences.cn: 英语被动语态可以分为行为被动语态和状态被动语态.
sentences.en: The English passive voice can be divided into the action al passive and the stative passive.

sentences.cn: 本句子用的是主动语态.
sentences.en: This sentence is in the active voice.

sentences.cn: 语法也很重要, 当然我现在着重学习被动语态和虚拟语气.
sentences.en: Grammar is also important, course, I now focus on learning the passive voice and subjunctive mood.

sentences.cn: 这个句子是主动语态, 你能把它变成被动语态 吗 ?
sentences.en: This sentence is in the active voice. Can you change it into the passive voice?

sentences.cn: 那个语句是主动语态,你能把它变为被动语态 吗 ?
sentences.en: This sentence is in the active voice. Can you alter it into the passive voice?

sentences.cn: 条件状语或从句 、 插入语和不同语态的使用也有其自身风格.
sentences.en: Besides , conditional adverbial clauses ( phrases ) , parenthesis , and the different usages of voice own their respective styles.

sentences.cn: 本句为现在进行时的被动语态.
sentences.en: This is an example of passive voice in present progressive.

sentences.cn: 我们应该用被动语态翻译这个句子.
sentences.en: We should translate this sentence in passive voice.

sentences.cn: “ worth ” 一词可与主动语态的动名语连用.
sentences.en: The word " worth " can be construed with a gerund in active voice.

sentences.cn: 读文章, 用主动语态改写用黑体标的句子.
sentences.en: Read the passage and then rewrite the phrases in bold, using the Active Voice.

sentences.cn: 把下列句子变成疑问句, 要用被动语态.
sentences.en: Change the following sentences into questions, using the Passive Voice.

sentences.cn: 掌握主动语态 和 被动语态.
sentences.en: To grasp the Active Voice & the Passive Voice.

sentences.cn: 使用主动语态有助于直接表达你的意思,也可以避免句子过于冗长.
sentences.en: Using the active voice helps you be direct and keeps your sentences from being too wordy.

sentences.cn: 用被动语态改写句子.
sentences.en: Rewrite the sentences using the Passive Voice.

sentences.cn: 英语中有主动语态和被动语态两种.
sentences.en: There are two voices in grammar: active voice and passive voice.

sentences.cn: 好的作家避免使用被动语态. 实证论述比规范论述更有说服力.
sentences.en: The passive voice is avoided by good writers. Positive statements are more persuasive than normative statements.

sentences.cn: 把下列句子变成现在进行时的被动语态.
sentences.en: Change the following sentences into the Present Continuous Passive Voice.

sentences.cn: “鸟儿吃了种子”这句话使用了主动语态.
sentences.en: The birds ate the seeds uses the active voice.

sentences.cn: 动词随着人称 、 时态 、 语态和语气的不同可能会有词形的曲折变化.
sentences.en: Verbs may be inflected for person, tense, voice, and mood.

sentences.cn: 这些句子能变成被动语态.
sentences.en: These sentences can be changed into passive voice.

sentences.cn: 句子可以是主动或被动的.同样地, 动词也有“主动”和“被动”的语态.
sentences.en: As a result , verbs can also be in the active or passive voice.

sentences.cn: 这个句子是主动语态, 你能把它变为被动语态 吗 ?
sentences.en: This sentence is the active voice. Can you change it into the passive voice?

sentences.cn: 注: 动词有主动及被动语态之分.
sentences.en: Remark: Verbs can be either in the active or passive voice.

sentences.cn: 最后简要地论述了现代维吾尔语动词语态的历史来源问题.
sentences.en: At last expounds briefly the historical origin ofUighur v 3 rb voices.

sentences.cn: 用现在进行时的被动语态把下列句子变成疑问句.
sentences.en: Change the following sentences into questions, using the Present Continuous Passive voice.

sentences.cn: 千万别使用被动语态.
sentences.en: The passive voice should never be used.

sentences.cn: 我更了解被动语态的用法及会使用被动语态造句.
sentences.en: I can understand passive voice better and can make sentences in passive voice.

sentences.cn: 把下列句子变成一般将来时的被动语态.
sentences.en: Turn the following sentences into the Future Passive Voice.

sentences.cn: 上过这门课后,我会分辨主被动语态的句子.
sentences.en: I can sort out sentences active and passive voices after this lesson.

sentences.en: He pledged that his party would listen to the voice of the people.

sentences.en: A voice crying in the wilderness.

sentences.en: These attitudes of indulging children and disrespect towards teachers should arouse more opposing voices.

sentences.en: A good leader should always pay heed to the voice of the masses.

sentences.en: Chinese economy become stronger and stronger, meanwhile , the voice request RMB revalue become higher too.

sentences.cn: 目前,要求人民币升值的呼声越来越高.
sentences.en: Current voice that requirement RMB appreciates is louder and louder.

sentences.cn: 倾听良心的呼声是一个很好的准则.
sentences.en: To hearken to the voice of conscience is a good rule.

sentences.cn: 因工作关系, 笔者与农民接触较多, 经常听到他们的呼声.
sentences.en: Because the job concerns, the author and farmer contact are more, often hear their voice.

sentences.cn: 上主由高天发出雷鸣,至高者吼出他的呼声.
sentences.en: The LORD thundered from heaven ; the Most High made his voice resound.

sentences.cn: 用他的《解放者》报, 他发出了废奴的呼声.
sentences.en: Through his newspaper, The Liberator, he became the voice of abolition.

sentences.cn: 但是他们对于这种正义和血缘的呼声,也同样充耳不闻.
sentences.en: They too have been deaf t o the voice of justice and of consanguinity.

sentences.cn: 它们的呼声和力量如果压抑得太久,也许就起不到什么作用了.
sentences.en: Its voice and force may count for nothing if they are withheld too long.

sentences.cn: 当前, 我省各地有关工业化建设的呼声很高.
sentences.en: Current, the voice that I save each district to be built about industrialization is very loud.

sentences.cn: 飘泊的歌儿从我心中飞去在你爱的呼声里寻找窠巢.
sentences.en: Migratory songs wing from my heart and seek their nests in your voice od love.

sentences.cn: 在当前局势下, 类似平准基金设立的呼声已愈演愈烈.
sentences.en: In current situation, similar to stabilization fund set up by the voice has become.

sentences.cn: 听众的欢呼声淹没了这位教授的声音.
sentences.en: The cheers of the audience drowned the professor's voice.

sentences.cn: 由审批向备案转换的呼声早已有之.
sentences.en: Approval by the conversion to record the voices of long ago there.

sentences.cn: 他善于倾听群众的呼声.
sentences.en: He had a keen ear for voice of the people.

sentences.cn: 与此同时, 平准基金的呼声又再度高涨.
sentences.en: At the same time, the voice of the stabilization fund rising again.

sentences.cn: 人们正在听到越来越多从前沉默的呼声.
sentences.en: More and more formerly silent voices are being heard.

sentences.cn: 在林肯形象的感召下, 他们以千百万兴高采烈的呼声气势作出了响应.
sentences.en: In the spell of Lincoln's presence, the spirit of their million joyous voices answered.

sentences.cn: 我再也听不到社会的呼声了.
sentences.en: I can't hear the voices of society anymore.

sentences.cn: 但是她们对于这种正义和血缘的呼声,也同样充耳不闻.
sentences.en: They too HAs be deaf to the voice of onlyice and of consanguinity.

sentences.cn: 毫无疑问的是, 在一片为股票发出的震耳欲聋的欢呼声中,他们的声音将很难被听见.
sentences.en: Their voices, no doubt, will barely be heard amid the deafening clamour for shares.

sentences.cn: 雇员在决策的过程中应该有发言权。
sentences.en: Employees should have a voice in the decision-making process.

sentences.cn: 但是你的合伙人对你如何经营公司不会有发言权。
sentences.en: But your partners will have no voice in how you operate your company.

sentences.cn: 你喜欢在服务员的收入上拥有发言权的感觉。
sentences.en: You like to feel that you have a voice in how much money your server makes.
sentences.from: 16年12月四级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 我对数百没有发言权的人演讲.
sentences.en: I'm giving a voice to the hundreds of people who don't have a voice.

sentences.cn: 我对此事没有多少发言权.
sentences.en: I have little voice in the matter.

sentences.cn: 游行示威者要求让黑人在政府中有举足轻重的发言权.
sentences.en: The demonstrators demanded that blacks be given a substantial voice in the government.

sentences.cn: 这项措施使我们在这件事上具有发言权.
sentences.en: The measure ensures to ( for ) us a voice in the matter.

sentences.cn: 俱乐部会员在逃选发言人这个问题上有发言权 吗 ?
sentences.en: Will the club members have a voice in choosing the speakers?

sentences.cn: 普遍性: 制订重大政策决定时,所有国家都有发言权.
sentences.en: Its universality: all countries have a voice when major policy decisions are made.

sentences.cn: 保守主义有许多发言权.
sentences.en: Conservatism has many voices.

sentences.cn: 我们对那项决定没有发言权.
sentences.en: We have no voice in the decision.

sentences.cn: 在那个时期,下级组织对于上级领导机关实际上几乎没有发言权.
sentences.en: In those days lower organizations had practically no right to voice opinions to higher organizations.

sentences.cn: 和女子都对他们所讨论的一切问题有发言权.
sentences.en: Every male and female member had a voice upon all questions brought before it.

sentences.cn: 工人要求在管理决策上有发言权.
sentences.en: The workers want a voice in management decisions.

sentences.cn: 他们想要建立民主制度,使人们在政府中有发言权.
sentences.en: They wanted to establish a democracy where people could have a voice in government.

sentences.cn: 我可以作为一名观察员出庭会议,但我在讨论中没有发言权.
sentences.en: I can attend the meetings as an observer but I have no voice in their discussions.

sentences.cn: 这个规定使我们对这个问题有了发言权.
sentences.en: This provision ensures to / for us a voice in the subject.

sentences.cn: 你对此事无发言权.
sentences.en: You have no voice in the matter.

sentences.cn: 这在很大程度上取决于在变革后的国际体制结构中,中国有多大的发言权.
sentences.en: Much depends on the extent of China's voice in an altered international institutional architecture.

sentences.cn: 最近几个月其获得了政治上的发言权.
sentences.en: In recent months it has acquired a political voice.

sentences.cn: 你对自己做的事已没有那么多发言权了.
sentences.en: You have less voice in what you do.

sentences.cn: 我在这个问题上没有发言权.
sentences.en: I have no voice in the matter.

sentences.cn: 人民必须有发言权.
sentences.en: The people must have a voice.

sentences.cn: 妇女 、 奴隶 、 外籍居民的公民权被剥夺,在政府中没有任何发言权.
sentences.en: Women, slaves, resident aliens were denied citizenship and had no voice in the government.

sentences.cn: 每一个成年男子和女子都对他们所讨论的一切问题有发言权.
sentences.en: Every adult male and female member had a voice upon all questions brought before it.

sentences.cn: 但是你的合伙人对你如何经营公司不会有发言权。
sentences.en: But your partners will have no voice in how you operate your company.

sentences.cn: 已经有点钱财或土地的人应当对其走向有发言权。
sentences.en: The people who already own a bit of money or land ought to have a voice in saying where it goes.

sentences.cn: 他的声音大而有力, 但发音却非常不清楚.
sentences.en: He had a loud, strong voice, but his pronunciation was far from clear.

sentences.cn: 发音,语调, 重音, 停顿, 不求完美, 但要基本正确.
sentences.en: Attention voice The pronunciation , intonation, stress, pause, not perfect, but the basic right.

sentences.cn: 在陈述句的句尾,发音通常降低.
sentences.en: The voice often falls at the end of statement.

sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨期Blom-Singer发音重建术的适应证 、 相关的技术要点以及失败的原因.
sentences.en: Objective : To investigate the indication, techniques and reasons of failure of the Blom Singer technique for voice restoration.

sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨声门型喉癌半导体激光各型手术后发音功能恢复状况.
sentences.en: Objective : To explore voice restoration of patients glottic carcinoma after laser surgery.

sentences.cn: 他让自己的口音变得粗俗起来，接近伦敦东区的发音。
sentences.en: He had coarsened his voice to an approximation of Cockney.

sentences.cn: 底特律的阿拉伯人所表达的似乎主要是一种挫折感。
sentences.en: The predominant opinion voiced by Detroit's Arab population seems to be one of frustration.

sentences.cn: 一家由天主教教会开办的、贫民区居民可以在其节目中表达抗议的社区电台
sentences.en: ...a community radio run by the Catholic Church which gave voice to the protests of the slum-dwellers.

sentences.cn: 这位发言人表达了群众的感情.
sentences.en: The spokesman voiced the feeling of the crowd.

sentences.cn: 公告的发布激起一片指责的浪潮,居民也对无法预测的未来表达了自己的焦虑.
sentences.en: The announcement provoked a storm of criticism and anxious residents voiced concern over their uncertain future.

sentences.cn: 在当今的思想环境下怎么样才能最有效得表达有神论的思想 呢 ?
sentences.en: VOICE : How can theism be presented most effectively in modern thought?

sentences.cn: 他们给每一位参与者都提供一个机会表达出对很多问题的看法.
sentences.en: They provide an opportunity for each participant to voice their opinions on many issues.

sentences.cn: 让所有委员都有机会表达他们的意见.
sentences.en: Give all members a chance to voice their opinions.

sentences.cn: 让参加者表达意见,以一人一票的形式选出他们最喜欢的设计.
sentences.en: Participants voiced out their opinions by voting for their favorite design.

sentences.cn: 王进喜同志的这句豪言壮语,表达了大庆工人、干部和家属的雄心壮志.
sentences.en: This heroic utterance by Comrade Wang Jinxi voices the lofty aspirations of the workers and caders of Daqing and their families.

sentences.cn: 使用主动语态有助于直接表达你的意思,也可以避免句子过于冗长.
sentences.en: Using the active voice helps you be direct and keeps your sentences from being too wordy.

sentences.cn: 请张贴连结,表达对你所做的例子.
sentences.en: Please post a link to voice over examples that you have done.

sentences.cn: 球迷代表会见了体育大臣,表达他们对马尔科姆.格拉泽购买俱乐部的反对意见.
sentences.en: Supporter representatives met the minister to voice opposition to Malcolm Glazer's purchase of the club.

sentences.cn: 他被选去表达他们的不满.
sentences.en: He was chosen to voice their grievance.

sentences.cn: 只有少数人表达了对该部门发展方向的关切.
sentences.en: Only a few people voiced their concerns over the direction of the department.

sentences.cn: 给出了重力所致水平地应力的科学表达方式.
sentences.en: It gives the scientific voice way of horizontal crustal stress by gravity.

sentences.cn: 他们真正关心社会并以和平恰当的方式表达自己的观点.
sentences.en: They had a sincere concern and voiced it in a nonviolent and appropriate way.

sentences.cn: 他在一首诗里美妙地表达了这种热望.
sentences.en: He has beautifully voiced this longing in one of his poems.

sentences.cn: 发展中国家必须对这一行动勇敢地表达自己的反对意见.
sentences.en: Developing countries had to raise their voice against such a move.

sentences.cn: 在他的演讲中, 他表达了时代的感情.
sentences.en: In his speech, he voiced the feeling of the times.

sentences.cn: 个人表达传播行为随媒介发展的同时, 社会对个人言论的控制一直同个人表达行为相伴存在.
sentences.en: While Personal Expression Communication develop quickly with media, social control on personal voice is always existing.

sentences.cn: 数名校董已经表达了他们对新计划的观点.
sentences.en: Several executives of the school have voiced their opinions on the new project.

sentences.cn: 而在华盛顿, 奥巴马(Obama)政府表达了同样的看法, 不过语气更加委婉,更像是外交辞令.
sentences.en: In Washington, the Obama administration has voiced similar thoughts, albeit more diplomatically and obliquely.

sentences.cn: “多数投票决定制度”投票是让居民表达出他们更喜欢哪种公共商品的一种方式.
sentences.en: Majority rule voting is one way for citizens to voice their preference for public goods.

sentences.cn: 他表达出群众的情绪.
sentences.en: He voiced the feelings of the crowd.

sentences.cn: 而王菲具有疗愈特质的空灵天籁, 被视为表达歌曲中崇高精神的完美之选.
sentences.en: Faye Wong's soothing , ethereal voice was considered perfect for conveying and lofty spirit of the song.

sentences.cn: 学生们表达了对于新建筑物的喜悦.
sentences.en: The students gave voice to their pleasure over the new building.

sentences.cn: 当主席要求提高工资时,他表达的是所有与会者的感情.
sentences.en: The chairman voiced the feeling of the meeting when he demanded more pay.

sentences.cn: 大炮威严的轰鸣尖锐地表达了国际社会对侵略的义愤.
sentences.en: The haughty voices of the cannon sharpened the indignation of the international community against aggression.

sentences.cn: 社论表达了年轻人的心情.
sentences.en: The editorial voices the spirits of the young people.

sentences.cn: 主教醒过来,用虚弱的声音说出.
sentences.en: The bishop said it with a feeble voice as he woke.

sentences.cn: 我们怎么才能给那些不能说出心声的人一种声音?
sentences.en: How can we give these people a voice, the voiceless people?

sentences.cn: 我能做些什么,来改掉这种温和的嗓音,放开声音, 大声说出自己的想法 呢 ?
sentences.en: What can I do to overcome my soft voice, project my and speak up?

sentences.cn: 为了下一代的教育! 为了您的孩子有更好的教育! 把您的教育诉求说出来!
sentences.en: Education for the Next Generation! Better Your Child's Education! Have Your Voice Heard!

sentences.cn: 这句朴实 、 简单、略带伤感的话说出了第八届“汉语桥”所有选手的心声.
sentences.en: Simple succinct, and slightly sad, these words were actually the voice of each contestant.

sentences.cn: 在他未说出他是谁之前我听出了他的嗓音.
sentences.en: I recognize his voice before he say who he is.

sentences.cn: 那天说出了很多非常好的项目构想,有些已在实施当中.
sentences.en: Many great project ideas were voiced that day and some are alreadygetting underway.

sentences.cn: 我清楚说出了我的感觉.
sentences.en: I gave voice to my feelings.

sentences.cn: 我们说出的话, 无论声音多么嘹亮,都是别的喉咙嘟囔过的.
sentences.en: So we say, no matter how resonant voice and throat are other script before.

sentences.cn: 罗亚尔·爱德华兹说出了彼得刚才想到过的问题.
sentences.en: Royal Edwards voiced the thought which had occured first to Peter.

sentences.cn: 罗亚尔?爱德华兹说出了彼得刚才想到过的问题.
sentences.en: Royal Edwards voiced the thought which had occurred first to Peter.

sentences.cn: 她吞了一口气,觉得自己能说出话来了.
sentences.en: She gulped once and found her voice.

sentences.cn: 说出这可怕的消息时,嗓音都变了.
sentences.en: Her voice broke as she told the dreadful news.

sentences.cn: 他说出了所有老人的抱怨.
sentences.en: He is voicing the complaint of all old people.

sentences.cn: 麦克说出最后这两个字时，吓得声音颤抖。
sentences.en: Mack made his voice quiver with fear on these last two words.

Sentence.sentence: You actually love tipping! You like to feel that you have a voice in how much money your server makes.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: One day, when he went to get his 7-year-old son from soccer practice, his kid greeted him with a downcast face and a sad voice.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: At the time, I am sure she thought  she was teaching me about mechanics, transitions ( ' ,  过渡 ), structure, style and voice.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Modern airplanes have two black boxes: a voice recorder, which tracks pilots' conversations,and a flight-data recorder, which monitors fuel levels, engine noises and other operating functions that help investigators reconstruct the aircraft's final moments.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: You are speaking to a voice coming from someone you cannot see.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文
